name: SlidesAI
description: SlidesAI is an AI-powered tool that transforms text into professional presentations for Google Slides and PowerPoint.
longDescription: SlidesAI is an AI-driven presentation creation platform designed to streamline the process of crafting visually appealing slides. By integrating seamlessly with Google Slides and Microsoft PowerPoint, it allows users to generate presentations directly within familiar platforms, eliminating the need to learn new software. The tool converts text inputs, such as topics, scripts, or documents, into structured slide decks, saving time for students, educators, and professionals. Its mission is to enhance productivity by automating tedious slide formatting while offering customizable designs. SlidesAI addresses the challenge of creating engaging presentations quickly, making it ideal for users with tight schedules or limited design skills. Despite some limitations in advanced features, it provides a user-friendly solution for efficient slide creation.
features: Converts text inputs like topics or scripts into structured slide decks, saving hours of manual formatting.
Integrates seamlessly with Google Slides and PowerPoint, allowing users to work within existing workflows.
Offers customizable color presets and professionally designed themes to enhance presentation aesthetics.
Generates AI-assisted slide outlines that users can review and tweak for personalized content.
Includes an AI image generator to add relevant visuals to slides, improving engagement.
Supports multilingual text inputs, enabling users to create presentations in various languages.
Allows users to add logos for consistent branding across all slides.
Provides a free plan with up to 5 AI-generated presentations, ideal for occasional users.
Features a Magic Write tool to rewrite or remix slide content for better clarity or style.
Exports presentations directly to Google Slides or PowerPoint with no reformatting needed.

faqs.question: What is SlidesAI?
faqs.answer: SlidesAI is an AI-powered add-on for Google Slides and PowerPoint that converts text into professional presentations, saving time and effort.

faqs.question: Does SlidesAI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, SlidesAI provides a free plan that allows users to create up to 5 AI-generated presentations with limited features.

faqs.question: Which platforms does SlidesAI support?
faqs.answer: SlidesAI currently works with Google Slides and Microsoft PowerPoint, with seamless integration for both platforms.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account to use SlidesAI?
faqs.answer: No, you can run SlidesAI from a Google Slides presentation, and an account is automatically created.

faqs.question: Can I customize the generated slides?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can review, edit outlines, choose themes, and adjust colors or content to match their needs.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my SlidesAI subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription via the 'Your Account' tab or follow the guide on the SlidesAI website.

faqs.question: Does SlidesAI support other presentation software besides Google Slides and PowerPoint?
faqs.answer: Currently, SlidesAI only supports Google Slides and PowerPoint, but other integrations may be considered based on demand.

faqs.question: How does the AI image generator work?
faqs.answer: The AI image generator creates visuals based on user-provided descriptions, enhancing slide aesthetics with relevant images.

faqs.question: Is SlidesAI suitable for team collaboration?
faqs.answer: SlidesAI-generated presentations can be edited collaboratively in Google Slides or PowerPoint, supporting team workflows.

faqs.question: What happens if I encounter issues with SlidesAI?
faqs.answer: You can contact support via the chat button on the SlidesAI website for prompt assistance.
